cilantro.messages.envelope.envelope module¶

class cilantro.messages.envelope.envelope.Envelope(data)[source]¶

Bases: cilantro.messages.base.base.MessageBase

classmethod create_from_message(message, signing_key, verifying_key=None, uuid=-1)[source]¶
classmethod create_from_objects(seal, meta, message)[source]¶
classmethod from_bytes(data, validate=True, cache_binary=True)[source]¶

Deserializes binary data and uses it as the underlying data for the newly instantiated Message class If validate=True, then this method also calls validate on the newly created Message object. :type data: bytes :param data: The binary data of the underlying data interchange format :param validate: If true, this method will also validate the data before returning the message object :return: An instance of MessageBase

Return type:bytes

meta_binary¶

validate()[source]¶

Validates the underlying data, raising an exception if something is wrong :return: Void :raises: An exception if there if an issues arrises validating the underlying data
